about_the_game:
Welcome to Don't Find Me!!, a new horror game that plunges you into a terrifying atmosphere where your mission is to survive and find a way to escape. Inspired by classics like Slenderman, Don't Find Me!! challenges you to collect six books scattered in a dark and oppressive environment while avoiding dangers lurking in the shadows.

Prepare to dive into the unknown, where every dark corner could hide a deadly threat. Your only weapon is your ability to move cautiously, to meticulously explore every nook, and to keep your cool amidst the horror surrounding you. Managing your stamina and your flashlight's energy is crucial.

Each monster roaming this living nightmare has its own unique gameplay mechanic, forcing you to adapt your strategy and think quickly to escape their grasp. It's up to you to discover and adapt to every situation. Each encounter will test you and add an extra layer of tension to your experience.

Will you dare to plunge into the darkness and face your deepest fears? Or will you succumb to the creeping dread enveloping you? In Don't Find Me!!, the choice is yours, but remember, in this nightmarish world, every decision could cost you your life.

Prepare for an intense horror experience where your only chance of survival lies in your ingenuity, your quick thinking, and your ability to keep your calm in the most desperate moments. Are you ready to confront the unknown and take on the challenge of Don't Find Me!!?

name: Don't Find Me !!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: Non

short_description: Dive into horror with Don't Find Me!!, where your mission is to survive by collecting 6 books while avoiding the lurking monsters. Keep your cool and your flashlight on to hope for escape. Are you ready to face your fears in this terrifying nightmare?
